ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T19:06:06 [Issue ID 4000-53445] urn:comicvine:4000-53445 urn:grandcomicsdatabase:issue/53445 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 12:40:13. [Issue ID 53445]
ComicInfo.Summary: Mighty Man rescues Dart and Star from a battle during a jailbreak. Dragon and Alex Wilde conclude that Lt. Darling is corrupt. SkullFace threatens Darling's family. The Fiend unsuccessfully attacks Dragon. Police find the dead couple in DeKalb.
